title: Chili Plus Cook-Off Fellowship
description:
_Saturday, March 21st at 5:00 p.m._

_At the Building_

Are you ready for the Chili Plus Cook-Off on March 21st at 5 PM? Bring your best Chili and Plus Items! Be prepared to compete in the following categories:

* Best Overall - This category is for the best of the best. Do you have what it takes?
* Spiciest - If you like it hot, then this category is for you!
* Most Unique - Almost anything goes in this category, so be creative!
* Best Plus Item - Plus Items are like your chili's sidekick. They can be cornbread, sandwiches, or anything else you can think of!
* Best Table Display - How much creativity can you fit into a space of about 30 inches by 30 inches? We want to know.

Also, for those of you who like desserts, there will be prizes for Best Dessert!

Sign up sheet is on the bulletin board.
